metadata.title: CVE-2022-44789 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A logical issue in O_getOwnPropertyDescriptor() in Artifex MuJS 1.0.0through 1.3.x before 1.3.2 allows an attacker to achieve Remote CodeExecution through memory corruption, via the loading of a craftedJavaScript file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-44789` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmujs2 - 1.3.2-1
mujs - 1.3.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mujs package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-1').
